name: Linen Children's  blanket/Playmat in a Tote Bag-Piglet
description:
100% Linen Children's blanket/playmat in a one of a kind tote bag.

Front is Natural Baltic linen, back you have an option of either deep purple or thin black and white stripes, both of which create an unexpected modern look.

Detailed with Etsuko Furuya's  Echino Red piglet fabric. Reminiscent of Charlotte's Web (This part of medium-weight Japanese fabric is 55% linen and 45% cotton).

Batting is made from 100% USA grown natural cotton, soft and warm.

You can use it as a crib blanket, summer toddler blanket, stroller blanket or playmat. 

Simple chic linen tote bag makes it easy to carry and store.

Handmade in USA

Machine washable, tumble dry low or hang to dry. It gets softer and better after each wash

Size (Approx.) 30x39inch
76.5x99cm

name: Hand Crafted Wooden Pull Duck (Oak)
description:
This lovely sturdy duck pull toy is hand cut from solid oak and all edges are sanded smooth. It is protected with a child safe beeswax finish. The pull cord is connected with a recessed plug on both ends so there is no knot visable. The duck measures 8.5 (21.6 cm) inches long and 6.5 (16.5 cm) inches tall. The full cord is in Orange 

Handmade in USA

name: Hand Crafted Wooden Cars (Oak)
description:
Perfect size for small hands! These cars are hand crafted from beautiful oak wood with a completely safe natural beeswax finish. Each car is approximately 2.5 inches tall and between 4 to 5 inches long. The set includes the 3 cars in the three body shapes.

Handmade in USA

name: Heppa Linen Tea/Kitchen Towel by Hanna Konola
description:
Exclusively for Suvi Ainoa. 

We collaborate with a talented Finnish artist- Hanna Konola on this lovely tea towel. Hanna's drawing always brings back the childhood innocence.  

Hand made with 100% beautiful textured medium weight White linen and screen printed with environmentally friendly dye.

Size (Approx.) 18.5x26.5Inch
                      47x67.5cm

Designed in Finland
Made in USA

*'Heppa' is what children call pony in Finnish.

name: Mökki Linen Tea/kitchen Towel by Hanna Konola
description:
Exclusively for Suvi Ainoa. 

We collaborate with a talented Finnish artist- Hanna Konola on this lovely tea towel. Hanna's drawing always brings back the childhood innocence.  
Mökki is a Finnish word for cottage. Do you think those are the pink clouds over looking the wooden cottage or they are the pink snow soon falling on the ground?

Hand made with 100% beautiful textured medium weight white linen and screen printed with environmentally friendly dye.

Size (Approx.) 18.5x26.5Inch
                      47x67.5cm

Designed in Finland
Handmade in USA

name: 2 Sets of 12 color Wooden Pencil
description: 24 vibrant color pencil, made from recycled birch wood. Packed in simple recycled cardboard tubes.

name: Eastern Folk Art Photo Album -Paper Cut
description:
I still like to open the actual photo albums to look at the older pictures sometimes. The emotions brought back are quite different from viewing them on a computer. 

This is a modern take on the old Eastern folk arts. This Chinese folk art photo album is hand made from recycled paper.The style of the painting on the cover is a traditional peasant painting, about a family gathering together to prepare the new year's feast.

Inside the album, every page has a removable print of unique Chinese paper cut. These prints can be used as postcards, bookmarks or simply framed as pictures.

name: Eastern Folk Art Photo Album -Forgotten Street Vendors
description: This is one my favorite albums, it is hand made from recycled paper. Inside the 20 page album, each page features a unique beautiful print of those street vendors in the old China that no longer exist; such as the man selling lotus roots, a street candle maker and a silk thread salesman...

name: Eastern Folk Art Photo Album -Peasant painting
description:
This is a modern take on the old Eastern folk arts. This Chinese folk art photo album is hand made from recycled paper.

Inside the album, every page has a removable print of unique Chinese peasant painting. These prints can be used as postcards, bookmarks or simply framed as pictures.

name: 'So/Go' Notebook
description:
Beautifully illustrated notebooks, made from recycled paper. Same style illustration inside as page divider. 

A set of four, each with its own illustration. 
Price is for one notebook.
